page.title: 16PETERSFIELD - EDUCATION
page.content: {PETERSFIELD FURTHER EDUCATION CENTRE serves the area around East Meon Stroud Froxfield Liss and Buriton and has a total of 1575 students (Sept. 1985). Over 100 courses are running, catering for the vocational and non- vocational needs of the community. The majority of the classes are held at Petersfield School but many day and evening courses are held in premises around the town and villages. With unemployment increasing, more daytime courses are being held, some are combined with the school 6th Form classes and demand for vocational courses, especially Maths, English and Foreign Languages is increasing. {Petersfield Youth Club}is housed in a purpose built centre on the school site. There are 80 senior and 35 junior members and 8 paid leaders.
